game.name: Noble Fates
game.genres: Action, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: RPG 요소가 가미된 이 3D 판타지 왕국 경영 시뮬레이션에서, 반신의 힘을 활용해 보잘것없는 무리를 이끌고 부유한 왕국을 세우십시오. 하늘에서 명령하거나 3인칭으로 제어하며 만들고, 싸우고, 지배하십시오. 다양한 귀족의 세계를 탐험하며 그들의 존경을 얻고, 그들의 운명을 결정하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Harness your Demigod powers to lead a group from rags to riches in this 3D Fantasy Kingdom Management Sim with RPG elements. Command from the sky or take control in 3rd Person to BUILD, BATTLE, and RULE. Navigate a world of interesting Nobles, earn their respect, and decide their Fates.

reviewHighlights.text: Life before death. Strength before weakness. Gameplay before graphics.
I will leave a detailed Review in the future, but for now: yes, it's a pretty good game with unique and enjoyable gameplay. You should give it a try.
